events.message: The insured reported a vehicle collision that occurred on April 30th involving their car and another vehicle at an intersection.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on keywords indicating a motor vehicle collision.
An agent experienced in auto accident claims has been assigned to handle the investigation and communication.
The insured was formally notified that their auto accident claim has been received and is being processed.
Request sent to insured asking for photographs of vehicle damage and police collision report to support the claim.
The insured has submitted all requested documents, including accident photos, damage assessment, and police report.
Investigation has begun to verify facts of the auto accident claim using submitted evidence and third-party statements.
Investigation concluded confirming insured’s vehicle was damaged due to the documented collision and fault was assessed.
A settlement offer has been proposed to the insured for repair costs based on market rates and investigation results.
The insured responded positively to the settlement offer and expressed satisfaction with the communication and process.
The claim has been approved for payment following insured’s acceptance of the proposed settlement terms.
Payment for vehicle repair has been issued to insured’s designated bank account promptly after approval.
The auto accident claim has been officially closed after successful settlement and payment to the policyholder.
Documentation and records for this auto accident claim have been archived for future reference and compliance.
